content.raw:
Just to clarify…

* The "phase2" and "practice" worlds we released all use the non-underscore version and are consistent with the documentation.  I think that is 9 examples of the perception task that use identification strings consistent with the documenation.
* [PR #217](#!/osrf/vrx/pull-requests/217/fix-issue-189) - removes the underscore from a few[ earlier examples](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/vrx_tasks_2019#markdown-header-3-perception) so that they are consistent with the documentation.

I don't think it would warrant a forum post as that is likely to muddy the waters - we are staying consistent with the published documentation. Most of the examples are consistent with the documentation and we are not changing the documentation, so really a minor change.

Thank you @{557058:335cae63-ffdf-48a7-8317-496d75bc8f52} for pointing this out!

‌
content.html:
Just to clarify…

  • The "phase2" and "practice" worlds we released all use the non-underscore version and are consistent with the documentation. I think that is 9 examples of the perception task that use identification strings consistent with the documenation.
  • PR #217 - removes the underscore from a few earlier examples so that they are consistent with the documentation.

I don't think it would warrant a forum post as that is likely to muddy the waters - we are staying consistent with the published documentation. Most of the examples are consistent with the documentation and we are not changing the documentation, so really a minor change.

Thank you @John Sumskas for pointing this out!

‌
